timeline.bodyText:

            	COMMENT Multiple goals can run at the same time, so long as they they are all using different controls.

timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:

 CLASS net/minecraft/class_1355 net/minecraft/entity/ai/goal/GoalSelector
